name: Hard Karma
description:
Hard Karma is a dream sort of. Attempt to make the game without most of the negative things in games and with positive ones.
What comes to mind when you hear "MMO"? For me - great waste of time in attempts to figure out the game mechanics and a huge dose of grind. And near zero fun. But the best thing about "MMO" is communication with other players and all the fun that comes with playing the game with real people side by side.The essenceFight together against strange and extraordinary bosses in dynamic gameplay for epic loot and fun in action PRG shooter. Half MMO, half - roguelike - brings the new gameplay.Testers reviews
Pros
  • Instant gameplay without learning too much.
  • Skill-based action gameplay.
  • Epic boss fight where first-level player can fight solo with perfect skill.
  • Ocean of unique items, that can change the gameplay completely.
  • Unlike regular MMOs, play the true coop. Full trade, 100% exp share and drop for fighers.
  • Non-class system allows you to build your own charecter.
  • Crossplay

Cons
  • Hardcore. Bullethell. Permodeath.
  • Still in alpha. Most of the content is hidden.
